Player History
Drafted in 9th round, 144th overall pick, by Detroit in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Kevin Kunio (ATL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/24/2015, off Dave Gurrola (STL)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 5/24/2015...
Injured on 7/21/2015 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 3/2/2016 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Injured on 4/23/2016 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 2/3/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $900,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/18/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/13/2019 to a 2-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
Traded from Philadelphia to Kansas City on 3/2/2020 (Going to KC: CF Noah Derrick. Going to PHI: 2B Pierre Marguez)...
Injured on 8/15/2020 with a Broken Finger, out for 3-4 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (B) on 3/1/2021 to a minor league contract.
